metadata.feature_description: Analytics for idea submissions showing voting patterns and idea popularity

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Ideas tab
steps.expected: Ideas analytics dashboard loads with Creates & Views section visible
steps.actual: Ideas tab loaded successfully with Creates & Views section showing CREATES: 0 and VIEWS: 0 metrics with weekly trend chart

steps.action: Scroll down to view Creates & Views section
steps.expected: Creates metric displays idea submission count with weekly chart
steps.actual: Creates section visible showing submission rate of 0 with MON-SUN weekly trend chart

steps.action: View Community Health section in Ideas analytics
steps.expected: Voting pattern metric 'Ideas where votes have been taken away' is displayed
steps.actual: Metric 'Ideas where votes have been taken away' is visible showing 0% with Comparative Term comparison also at 0%

steps.action: View Community Health section for implementation status metrics
steps.actual: Two implementation status metrics visible: 'Ideas without change in status in over 2 weeks' (N/A) and 'Ideas without change in company response in over 30 days' (N/A). N/A indicates no ideas exist to track

steps.action: Scroll to Popular Content section in Ideas analytics
steps.expected: Popular Content section displays ranking of popular ideas
steps.actual: Popular Content section visible with message 'No popular content available in selected period' - expected behavior when no idea data exists

steps.action: Review all Community Health metrics in Ideas tab
steps.expected: Ideas-specific metrics are displayed including view-related and voting-related metrics
steps.actual: Four idea-specific metrics visible in Community Health: 1) Ideas older than 6 hours with no Views (0%), 2) Ideas where votes have been taken away (0%), 3) Ideas without change in status in over 2 weeks (N/A), 4) Ideas without change in company response in over 30 days (N/A)

steps.action: Verify Engagement metrics specific to Ideas
steps.expected: Engagement section shows ideas-specific engagement data
steps.actual: Engagement section displays: Engagement 0%, Interacted 0, Formed Relationship 0, Shared 0 with weekly trend chart

steps.action: Change Comparative Term dropdown from '1 m' to '1 y'
steps.expected: Analytics data refreshes with new comparative term
steps.actual: Comparative Term dropdown changed to '1 y' (1 year), data refreshed showing same metrics. Dropdown options available: 1 y, 1 m, 1 w

steps.action: Verify date range picker is available
steps.expected: Date range picker allows custom date selection
steps.actual: Date range picker visible showing '2 Feb 2026 - 8 Feb 2026' with calendar icon for custom date selection

steps.action: Verify trend charts display weekly data
steps.actual: Both Engagement and Creates & Views charts show MON-SUN daily breakdown with appropriate Y-axis scale (1-6)

observations: The Ideas Module Analytics feature is fully functional with all UI elements rendering correctly
No actual idea data exists in the test environment, so metrics show 0% or N/A values - this is expected behavior

The 'N/A' display for status change metrics ('Ideas without change in status in over 2 weeks' and 'Ideas without change in company response in over 30 days') indicates these metrics require existing idea data to calculate
Export functionality is present via Export button in the header
Trending Tags section exists and shows 'No trending tags available in selected period' when no data present
The module navigation tabs (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki) allow switching between different social module analytics
Comparative Term dropdown provides three options: 1 y (year), 1 m (month), 1 w (week) for trend analysis
